trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].change()}<0 and {Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>0 and {Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<>2
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].change()}>0 and {Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].prev()}>0 and {Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Ethernet has changed to lower speed than it was before

dependency.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFDESCR}"}=1 and {Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].min(5m)}>{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFDESCR}"} ) or ({Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].min(5m)}>{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFDESCR}"})
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: ({Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].max(5m)}<{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFDESCR}"}*0.8) and ({Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].max(5m)}<{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFDESCR}"}*0.8)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: High error rate ( > {$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFDESCR}"} for 5m)

dependency.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFDESCR}"}=1 and {Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: In half-duplex mode
trigger_prototype.description: Please check autonegotiation settings and cabling

trigger_prototype.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFDESCR}"}=1 and {Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {Template Net TOPSEC TOS NGFW:net.topsec.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Link down

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}天融信防火墙序列号变更，可能发生HA切换
{HOST.NAME}天融信防火墙最大会话数超过10w条
{HOST.NAME}天融信防火墙版本发生变化
